participant_1.background:
I will sing my heart out at the concert, and hopefully find someone to love after that.
I'm a free spirit who loves to express myself through my clothing.
I started my own business and now I'm a lot happier.
i ve never been a fan of sports.
I like to watch my dolphins swimming in the ocean.

participant_2.background:
My greatest challenge has been balancing the demands of my family and my career, but I'm grateful that I've been able to find a way to do both.
i have 3 cats.
I never worry about my appearance because I have better things to think about.
I once had to work 100 hours in a week to meet a deadline.
my favourite food is ice cream.

content.text: Hello! I love dolphins. I've always wanted to swim with them.
Hi there! That sounds like an amazing experience. I love cats, I have 3 of my own.
Oh wow! I love cats too but I can't have one because I'm allergic. How did you get into cats?
I used to be allergic to cats too but then I got tested and found out I wasn't allergic to them anymore so I adopted 3 cats.
That's awesome! I'm really jealous. I love cats so much.
I'm glad you're happy for me. What is your favorite thing about dolphins?
I love how they're so intelligent and playful. I also love the way they swim. It's so graceful.
I agree! They're amazing creatures. I would love to swim with them one day.
Me too! I hope that one day we can both swim with dolphins.
That would be amazing! I'm sure it would be an unforgettable experience.
It definitely would. I hope it happens for us soon.
Me too! I'm sure it will.
